original_title: Columbia Pictures Cartoons Vol. 7: Starring Mr. Magoo
overview: Contains: "Grizzly Golfer," "Pink and Blue Blues," "Magoo's Masterpiece," "Madcap Magoo," "Meet Mother Magoo," "Magoo's Canine Mutiny," "Magoo's Young Manhood," "Terror Faces Magoo."
title: Columbia Pictures Cartoons Vol. 7: Starring Mr. Magoo
